resources.string: NASA Image of the Day App
This is the home page. Use the toolbar icons or dropdown menu to move to another page.
This is the Image of the Day. Press save to save the image for later viewing in Image History.
This is the Image Search. Press "Select Date" to select the Image of the Day of a past date. Press save to save the image for later viewing in Image History.
This is the Image History. Scroll through the titles in the bottom half of the screen. Select a title to display the image. Hold down on a title to display an option to delete the saved image.
Welcome to NASA Image of the Day App. Select a page to view from the toolbar or dropdown menu.
